		Question: what types of art did andy warhol do
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is "Pop Art, Painting".

Warhol was known as "The Silver Factory King" and was an artist that specialized in painting and painting silkscreens. He was born in Pittsburgh and attendedCarnegie Mellon University and was an art instructor. Warhol made silk-screen paintings of various items including portraits, portraits, portraits of celebrities, comic book characters, trinkets, soup cans, agricultural machinery, bullets and skulls, to name a few.
